title: How to get the joint axis in body frame?

content.raw: For example if I have a single revolute joint that, in the urdf, I have '<axis>0 0 1</axis>` I would like a function like, GetJointAxis() or something that returns a Vector3 that is just (0.,0.,1.). I feel like this should already be doable but can't figure it out from the given API.
